captions.text:
Is this a road
to itta bena?

Nah, nah, nah,
that ain't right.

Pete: It seems to me
there's a road...

Cow road that used to
lead all the way--

Pete: Well,
most of the way.

Hop on in while you
give it a think.

<i>George: Any of you</i>
<i>boys know your way</i>

Well, see, that's where
we can't help you.

I don't believe
it's in mississippi.

Friend, some of your folding
money has come unstowed.

<i>George: Just stuff it down</i>
<i>that sack there, will you?</i>

You boys aren't bad men,
I take it?

Well, it's funny
you should ask.

But me and pete here
been saved.

Delmar: I'm delmar,
and that there is everett.

Grab the tiller,
will you, buddy?

Hand me that chopper.
Ha ha ha ha!

Say, what line of work
you in, george?

You flatfooted, lame-brained,
soft-ass sons of bitches!

I'm bigger than any john,
live or limp!

I hate cows
worse than coppers!

Come on, you miserable,
salaried sons of bitches!

title: O Brother, Where Art Thou? (4/10) Movie CLIP - Baby Face Nelson (2000) HD

executed in the electric chair.
